meta.description: QubitGrid Scanner tier definitions and pricing copy (authoritative)
notes: UI renders features and marketing_message directly from this file.
Backend rate-limit reads scan_limit_per_day from the 'Free' tier unless FREE_DAILY_LIMIT env override is set.

tiers.name: Free
tiers.label: Scan & Learn
tiers.purpose: Let new users instantly see their LLM prompts tested for risk without commitment.
tiers.audience: Experimenting indie devs, hackathon projects, learners.
features: Core rule engine: injection, exfiltration, credentials, bearer tokens, exec patterns
No Slack alerts, no PDF reports, no exports
tiers.ui_notes: Show progress bar; disable Slack/PDF/CSV; CTA to Indie.
tiers.marketing_message: Try QubitGrid risk-free. Catch your first injection attempt in 30 seconds — no credit card required.

tiers.name: Indie
tiers.label: Build Responsibly
tiers.purpose: Empower indie developers and solopreneurs to ship AI features with basic safety telemetry and alerts.
tiers.audience: Indie devs, micro-SaaS founders, freelancers embedding GPT APIs.
features: Slack or Discord alert integration for high-severity rules
PDF sample report (with watermark) for client demos
Watermarked reports and limited analytics window
tiers.ui_notes: Enable alerts/CSV; show PDF watermark note; CTA to Pro.
tiers.marketing_message: Ship AI projects that clients trust. Indie plan adds Slack alerts, CSV logs, and report samples you can show in your pitch decks.

tiers.name: Pro
tiers.label: Audit-Ready Confidence
tiers.purpose: Give serious startups compliance-ready visibility into their prompt security posture.
tiers.audience: Startups and dev teams preparing for customers, investors, or audits.
features: OWASP LLM Top-10 risk mapping section
Webhook integrations (notify your system on new findings)
tiers.ui_notes: Badge 'Most Popular'; highlight full PDF sample.
tiers.marketing_message: Turn prompt safety into an advantage. Pro gives you the reports and audit trails investors expect.

tiers.name: Team
tiers.label: Compliance for Startups
tiers.purpose: Support growing teams collaborating on multiple AI projects with shared analytics and branded reports.
features: Multi-user access (5 seats, multiple API keys)
Custom logo on reports and emails
tiers.ui_notes: Show seat count and project usage; CTA to Enterprise.
tiers.marketing_message: Collaborate safely across projects. Team plan adds shared dashboards, custom branding, and multi-seat control.

tiers.name: Enterprise
tiers.label: Governance & Scale
tiers.purpose: Provide enterprise-grade compliance and deployment options for regulated or high-volume environments.
tiers.audience: Mid-size and large organizations needing on-premise or SOC2-aligned scanning.
tiers.ui_notes: Hide price; 'Contact Sales' button; dynamic form can pre-fill usage.
tiers.marketing_message: Bring QubitGrid inside your compliance perimeter. Enterprise gives you complete control over data, security, and uptime.

tiers.name: Lifetime
tiers.label: Founding Supporter
tiers.availability: Limited to 100 users or first 30 days after launch
tiers.purpose: Reward early believers and bootstrap cash flow during launch.
tiers.audience: Early adopters who want permanent access and to support development.
features: All Pro-tier features as of purchase date
Does not include future Enterprise-exclusive capabilities (SSO, data residency, etc.)
tiers.ui_notes: Show countdown/seat counter; after expiry hide and keep Pro.
tiers.marketing_message: Become a Founding Member — lifetime access to Pro for less than two months of subscription. Limited to the first 100 believers.

ui_display_guidelines: Show progress bar for scan usage
Grey out features not in the current plan
Lifetime shows countdown or seat counter
Include pre-audit disclaimer on pages & PDFs

upgrade_triggers.Free: Hits 100/day cap or needs Slack alerts
upgrade_triggers.Pro: Needs unwatermarked PDF and audit mapping
upgrade_triggers.Team: Needs shared keys and custom branding
upgrade_triggers.Lifetime: Limited run to build credibility and cash flow
